name: Gamerland
description: Gamerland is the largest gaming venue in Central Europe, uniquely designed for hosting professional gaming events. Our venue has 25+ high-end PCs, 20+ consoles, 6+ racing simulators, 4+ VR set, and several arcade games in the 4 arena sections created on the 1,000 m2 site with buffet & bar indoor.
shortDescription: Gamerland is the largest gaming venue in Central Europe.
